title: HTML Injection on Company Name on Email

weakness.name: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS)

summaries.content: By changing the company name to any HTML code on the TikTok Creator Marketplace, an attacker could  potentially use this to send phishing emails to users containing  injected HTML payload. We thank @gnux for reporting this to our team and confirming the resolution!
